name: Boximals Bounce
description:
You asked for, and now it's finally here, we've taken Boximals Hockey, made it 100x better and created BOXIMALS BOUNCE! 
The Boximals gang has created a game to pass the time in the jungle, and your goal is to help the team bounce the Boximal Armadillo into the net by solving the puzzles that stand in your way.
